docs.description: The UIS Data Centre contains indicators and raw data on education, literacy, science, culture and communication. The UIS collects these data from more than 200 countries and international organizations. The UIS is the primary data source of education, literacy and science data for leading publications and databases.

docs.name: Zillow Rent Index (Zip Codes): Rentals ZRI Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - 95815,Sacramento,CA
docs.description: The Zillow Home Rental Index is Zillow's estimate of the median rental price of all homes within the zip code of 95815, Sacramento, CA. This is derived by taking the estimated rent price for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

docs.name: Sri Lanka: PPG, other private creditors (NTR, current US$)
docs.description:
Public and publicly guaranteed other private credits from manufacturers, exporters, and other suppliers of goods, and bank credits covered by a guarantee of an export credit agency. Net transfers are net flows minus interest payments during the year; negative transfers show net transfers made by the borrower to the creditor during the year. Data are in current U.S. dollars.
PPG, other private creditors (NTR, current US$)

docs.name: Uganda: Drop-out rate. Primary. Grade 2. Total
docs.description:
Drop-out rate. Primary. Grade 2. Total is the proportion of pupils from a cohort enrolled in primary education in a given school year who are no longer enrolled in the following school year.
Drop-out rate. Primary. Grade 2. Total

docs.name: Korea, Dem. Rep.: Gender parity index for adult literacy rate
docs.description:
Gender parity index for adult literacy rate is the ratio of female adult literacy rate to the male adult literacy rate. It is calculated by dividing the female value for the indicator by the male value for the indicator. A GPI equal to 1 indicates parity between females and males. In general, a value less than 1 indicates disparity in favor of males and a value greater than 1 indicates disparity in favor of females.
Gender parity index for adult literacy rate

docs.name: Sierra Leone: Population growth (annual %)
docs.description:
Population growth (annual %) is the exponential rate of growth of midyear population from year t-1 to t, expressed as a percentage.

docs.name: Zillow Metrics (Neighborhoods): Decreasing Values (%) - Pennington Bend,Nashville,TN
docs.description: The percentage of all homes whose value has fallen in the last year. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

docs.name: Turkmenistan: Net ODA received (% of GNI)
docs.description:
Net official development assistance (ODA) consists of disbursements of loans made on concessional terms (net of repayments of principal) and grants by official agencies of the members of the Development Assistance Committee (DAC), by multilateral institutions, and by non-DAC countries to promote economic development and welfare in countries and territories in the DAC list of ODA recipients. It includes loans with a grant element of at least 25 percent (calculated at a rate of discount of 10 percent).
Net ODA received (% of GNI)

docs.description:
PISA: Students at the highest level of proficiency on the reading scale (%), male is the percentage of male students at Level 6 (above 698.32 score points) on the reading scale.

sources.description: Zillow is an online real estate database that was founded in 2005 and created by Rich Barton and Lloyd Frink, former Microsoft executives and founders of Microsoft spin-off Expedia. Spencer Rascoff is the current CEO of Zillow, Inc.
sources.name: Zillow Real Estate Research
